channel.title: Fleabag on Piazdre's Log
channel.description: Recent content in Fleabag on Piazdre's Log

item.title: Fleabag Review
item.description: In the last few days, I finally committed to watching Fleabag, a very short comedy-drama show written (and interpreted) by the brilliant English actress and screenwriter Phoebe Waller-Bridge. The show is incredibly witty yet profound, and I encourage anyone reading this to give it a shot if they haven’t already. Obviously, there’s a lot I could say about it, but I’m not going to make an in-depth review. Instead, I’ll talk only about a specific aspect.
